description: Enable instructors to manage their courses, deliver sessions, upload materials, and communicate with learners

userStories.title: Instructor Dashboard
userStories.description: As an instructor, I want a dashboard so that I see my teaching overview
acceptanceCriteria: Quick stats: total learners, sessions this week

userStories.title: View Assigned Courses
userStories.description: As an instructor, I want to see my courses so that I know what I'm teaching
acceptanceCriteria: List of programs assigned to instructor

userStories.title: View Upcoming Sessions
userStories.description: As an instructor, I want to see upcoming sessions so that I can prepare
acceptanceCriteria: Calendar or list view of sessions

userStories.title: View Enrolled Learners
userStories.description: As an instructor, I want to see enrolled learners so that I know my audience

userStories.title: Upload Course Materials
userStories.description: As an instructor, I want to upload materials so that learners can access them
acceptanceCriteria: Upload button for files (PDF, PPTX, DOC)

userStories.title: Materials Schema
userStories.description: As a developer, I want materials schema for file storage
acceptanceCriteria: CourseMaterial table: id, cohort_id, title, type, file_url, external_url, created_at

userStories.title: Delete/Update Materials
userStories.description: As an instructor, I want to manage materials so that content is current

userStories.title: View Session Attendance
userStories.description: As an instructor, I want to see attendance so that I know who attended
acceptanceCriteria: List of learners with attendance status

userStories.title: Manual Attendance Override
userStories.description: As an instructor, I want to mark attendance manually so that I can correct errors

userStories.title: Send Message to Learners
userStories.description: As an instructor, I want to message learners so that I can communicate
acceptanceCriteria: Send to all or selected learners

userStories.title: Message Schema
userStories.description: As a developer, I want message schema for communication
acceptanceCriteria: CourseMessage table: id, cohort_id, sender_id, subject, body, created_at

userStories.title: Request Certificate Override
userStories.description: As an instructor, I want to request certificate override so that deserving learners get certified
